price: Kandi uwo munsi umuriro wa Jahanamu uzazanwa. Kuri uwo munsi, umuntu azibuka, ariko se uko kwibuka kuzamumarira iki?
arabic: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wajīa yawma-idhin bijahannama yawma-idhin yatadhakkaru al-insānu wa-annā lahu al-dhik'rā
